concept.title: Generating a PIN
concept.shortdesc: To generate personal identification numbers, call the or verb.

conbody.p: Using a PIN generation algorithm, data used in the algorithm, and the PIN generation key, the verb generates a clear PIN and a PIN verification value, or offset. Using a PIN generation algorithm, data used in the algorithm, the PIN generation key, and an outbound PIN encrypting key, the verb generates and formats a PIN and encrypts the PIN block.
